title: 1.12.2怎么检测副手物品？
author: TheDDDust
txt_content: 怎么试都显示我与要求的结构数据不匹配

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
TheDDDust 发表于 2019-7-20 18:19
[18:18:00] 玩家标签命令执行失败，原因：Trailing data found at: ...6b,id:"minecraft:diamond_sword"} ...
你复制串行了


/scoreboard players tag @a remove selected

/scoreboard players tag @a add selected {Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,id:"minecraft:diamond_sword"}]}

say @a[tag=selected] 副手是钻石剑

是三条命令

replies.author: SPGoding
TheDDDust
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2019-7-20 17:26
/scoreboard players tag @a remove selected
/scoreboard players tag @a add selected {Inventory:[{Slot ...
[18:18:00] 玩家标签命令执行失败，原因：Trailing data found at: ...6b,id:"minecraft:diamond_sword"}]}s<--[HERE] 显示这个

replies.author: TheDDDust
replies.txt_content: 可以是那种检测副手触发红石的吗？

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
TheDDDust 发表于 2019-7-20 18:20
可以是那种检测副手触发红石的吗？
你非要红石的话，循环型命令方块执行

testfor @a {Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,id:"minecraft:diamond_sword"}]}

然后接个红石比较器


行了，我不反抗了。

replies.author: TheDDDust
replies.txt_content: 循环形命令方块还是显示我与要求的结构数据不匹配

replies.author: TheDDDust
replies.txt_content:
TheDDDust 发表于 2019-7-20 18:29
循环形命令方块还是显示我与要求的结构数据不匹配
不用了，好了
